function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High covid-19 infection rate in the u.s. despite having 4.25% of the world’s population","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Positivity rate of covid-19 tests in the u.s. above recommended levels","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Heterogeneity and disparities at the state level in meeting positivity recommendations","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Unauthorized access to sensitive data from g1 to g8","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Misinterpretation of g1 to g8 data leading to incorrect diagnosis","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of awareness and knowledge about covid-19 mitigation and early detection","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inaccurate risk assessment and detection platform","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Inadequate tracking of covid-19 patient presence","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Displaying covid-19 spread information without real-time updates could lead to misinformation and outdated data.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Testing the application with a small number of respondents may not represent the diversity of user experiences and needs.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Verifying the validity of the expert system without considering real-world medical scenarios may result in inaccurate and unreliable early detection results.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Web scraping process using java and jsoup library","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Use of sqlite database to store covid-19 data","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Performance evaluation and testing process","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Using web scraping to retrieve covid-19 data from external sources can lead to inaccurate or outdated information.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Dependence on a single website for covid-19 data retrieval increases the risk of system failure if the website is down or inaccessible.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential security risks when scraping data from external websites, including exposure to malicious code or unauthorized access to sensitive data.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Relying solely on web scraping for covid-19 data may result in incomplete or inaccurate information, increasing the risk of incorrect diagnosis and decision-making.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Dependence on an expert system for early detection of covid-19 may lead to misdiagnosis and delayed treatment, increasing the risk of disease transmission within the community.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of human expert oversight in the decision-making process based on the expert system’s recommendations may lead to errors and adverse consequences in covid-19 management.","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Implementation of a website-based expert system for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Diagnosis of covid-19 using ct image features","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Mobile application for covid-19 symptom diagnosis","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Reliance on web scraping for covid-19 information","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Deployment of mobile applications for covid-19 risk detection","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Recommend building measures not implemented correctly","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Lack of focus on airborne transmission reduction in systems","category":"","confidence":""},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of upper-room guv in killing or inactivating airborne microorganisms due to inadequate uv fluence rate or non-uniform uvgi
